name: Real Car Stunt Extreme Race 3D
description:
The real car stunt extreme race 3d allows you to boost your car racing and car parking skills by providing the most realistic simulation view. Jump and ride on the mid-air amazing tracks and feel like a champion’s racer. Use the nitro boost to cross the difficult hurdles and obstacles in this real car stunt game. Rush like a crazy rider and perform the adrenaline fueled pump action to discover the more and more amazing features of this off road car racing game. Fly over the ramps and dust off the rusty containers with your stunts and don’t lose the control of your stunt car. Unlike other stunt car games, the real impossible track racing give you the most adventurous gameplay and realistic car racing simulation on the real impossible tracks. So enjoy the endless impossible racing and beat the impossible race tracks and become the master of this stunt racing game.
If you are a fast speed racer and have a passion for car racing games then ready to experience real car rally in the mid of sky with no limits. Rush like a crazy stunt master while riding the beautifully designed real impossible tracks and beat the rival racers in this breathtaking adventure. Perform extreme car driving drifts and insane acrobatic ins mid-air flips on the impossible track 3D and rush like a real car drifter game. The impossible racing is a real challenge, fasten your seat belt before taking off and win this car racing simulator game. Unlike other car stunt games, this off road car rally is going to be a real fun and adventure.
There are several sports car available in this real impossible track race game to perform the incredible stunts on the ramps. Select favorite ride and start discovering the most dangerous and curvy off road tracks of the racing world. Start stunt car racing from a beautiful city sky parking stand in the lighted are to complete your level. The narrow and sharp racing tracks are built over the city in the endless blue sky. So play each thrilling racing mission with extreme care and get to the finish line within time. You have to complete each impossible race mission in order to unlock next one. Use different camera views to avoid the crashes and fall downs from the top of the racing tracks. Be perfect while taking the sharp and narrow turns and rush like a pro stunt master. Tap the nitro button to boost your stunt car whenever you feel your speed slow. Download the top game and become the real champion of the amazing impossible tracks car racing game. This Motor Car Sky high theft game provides you a variety of off-road fast and furious Motor Car for off road heavy tricky stunt car race surface. The only goal of this extreme Motor car game is to achieve the high score while completing all the tasks on off road dirt race track in this car race 3D game.
Racer come and be ready to drive in the astonishing environment with dangerous luxury car racing stunt on crazy heights and grand paths. Drivers take your crazy ride. Car racer mind it impossible tracks will doge you in driving simulation games. Crazy drivers who think they are best car driver, accept the mode of challenge and play. Ride your muscle auto on the deadly tracks and prove yourself as the best driver. Be a furious driver and do drifting and crashing in this auto action packed game. Your enemy is time and hurdles. Narrow roads and cutting edges on the road will threaten you. To perform this racing stunt and driving stunt tighten your seat belt and enjoy crazy driving on container roads. Climb over sky heights and enjoy.
Features:-
- Realistic HD graphics.
- Different environment in the sky.
- Turbo fast racing cars.
- Impossible, dangerous and narrow race tracks.
- Use driving skills to win.
- Paid game available on app store.
